name: Adventure in the Holy Land - Mobile Port
name_original: Adventure in the Holy Land - Mobile Port
description:
The Adventure in the Holy Land:

Play as Jesus Christ or a slew of other holy figures to avoid crucification from the romans!

Controls:

Menus:

Left Middle to go Back

Right Middle to Select

Top and Bottom to choose option

Game:

Up middle to jump

Down middle to dive

Right to rotate clockwise

Left to rotate counter-clockwise
